name: Badminton Legends: 3D Ball Sports
description:
In Badminton Legend, compete with crazy badminton players from all over the world!

Direct your role to move, tap your finger and jump, hit the shuttlecock! Do a crazy smash to your opponent. Enjoy extraordinary badminton game experience. Shock your opponent, take command of this badminton court. Draw your own badminton legend!

Badminton features:
- Easy to play, two playing modes for you to enjoy
- Stunning graphics and real badminton sound
- Coolest character skills
- 4 major scenes, beautiful visuals
- Tons of badminton equipment, define your role attribute

Swing your racket, be a leading role in this court.
Come and get this Crazy Badminton Game now!
